q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.types

Interface PTNIModeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainFrame, PTNDesktopController

    public interface PTNIModeListener
    This type is used for a simple observer pattern. The AppController may then inform all listed observers, when the editor mode changes to simulation mode and vice versa.
    Author:
    q8388415 - Massimiliano Brero
